rules.description: Shift+F15 ↦ ⇧
Cmd+F15 ↦ ⌘
Ctrl+F15 ↦ ⌃
Opt+F15 ↦ ⌥
Cmd+Opt+PgUp ↦ Shift+Cmd+Tab: Move to previous application
Cmd+Opt+PgDn ↦ Cmd+Tab: Move to next application
Shift?+Cmd+Home ↦ Shift?+Cmd+Up: Move/Select to document start
Shift?+Cmd+End ↦ Shift?+Cmd+Down: Move/Select to document end
Cmd+Opt+Insert ↦ Ctrl+Cmd+q: Lock screen
Shift+Opt+Insert ↦ Shift+Cmd+q: Log out
Cmd+Opt+Delete ↦ Ctrl+Cmd+Opt+Eject: Shutdown
Shift+Cmd+Opt+Delete ↦ Ctrl+Cmd+Opt+Eject: Reboot
Del ↦ Cmd+Opt+Fn+Bksp: Delete file
Shift?+Home ↦ Shift?+Cmd+Left: Move/Select to line start
Shift?+End ↦ Shift?+Cmd+Right: Move/Select to line end
Shift+Cmd+Backspace ↦ Cmd+Delete: Delete to line start
Shift+Cmd+Delete ↦ Ctrl+k: Delete to line end
Shift?+Opt+Left ↦ Opt+F14: Move to previous or leftward pane
Shift?+Opt+Up ↦ Opt+F18: Move to previous or upward pane
Shift?+Opt+Right ↦ Shift?+Opt+F16: Move/Split to next or rightward pane
Shift?+Opt+Down ↦ Shift?+Opt+F12: Move/Split to next or downward pane
Shift?+Cmd+Up ↦ Shift?+Opt+Up: Move/Select to paragraph start
Shift?+Cmd+Down ↦ Shift?+Opt+Down: Move/Select to paragraph end
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+7 ↦ {space≔7, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+7}: Moves/Window to top-left screen
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+8 ↦ {space≔8, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+8}: Moves/Window to top-center screen
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9 ↦ {space≔9, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9}: Moves/Window to top-right screen
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+4 ↦ {space≔4, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+4}: Moves/Window to middle-left screen
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+5 ↦ {space≔5, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+5}: Moves/Window to middle-center screen
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+6 ↦ {space≔6, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+6}: Moves/Window to middle-right screen
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+1 ↦ {space≔1, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+1}: Moves/Window to bottom-left screen
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+2 ↦ {space≔2, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+2}: Moves/Window to bottom-center screen
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+3 ↦ {space≔3, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+3}: Moves/Window to bottom-right screen
space≡7 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {space≔9, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9}: Moves/Window to top-right screen
space≡8 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {space≔7, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+7}: Moves/Window to top-left screen
space≡9 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {space≔8, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+8}: Moves/Window to top-center screen
space≡4 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {space≔6, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+6}: Moves/Window to middle-right screen
space≡5 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {space≔4, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+4}: Moves/Window to middle-left screen
space≡6 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {space≔5, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+5}: Moves/Window to middle-center screen
space≡1 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {space≔3, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+3}: Moves/Window to bottom-right screen
space≡2 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {space≔1, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+1}: Moves/Window to bottom-left screen
space≡3 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {space≔2, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+2}: Moves/Window to bottom-center screen
space≡7 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Up ↦ {space≔1, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+1}: Moves/Window to bottom-left screen
space≡8 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Up ↦ {space≔2, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+2}: Moves/Window to bottom-center screen
space≡9 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Up ↦ {space≔3, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+3}: Moves/Window to bottom-right screen
space≡4 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Up ↦ {space≔7, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+7}: Moves/Window to top-left screen
space≡5 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Up ↦ {space≔8, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+8}: Moves/Window to top-center screen
space≡6 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Up ↦ {space≔9, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9}: Moves/Window to top-right screen
space≡1 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Up ↦ {space≔4, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+4}: Moves/Window to middle-left screen
space≡2 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Up ↦ {space≔5, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+5}: Moves/Window to middle-center screen
space≡3 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Up ↦ {space≔6, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+6}: Moves/Window to middle-right screen
space≡7 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {space≔8, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+8}: Moves/Window to top-center screen
space≡8 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {space≔9, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9}: Moves/Window to top-right screen
space≡9 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {space≔7, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+7}: Moves/Window to top-left screen
space≡4 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {space≔5, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+5}: Moves/Window to middle-center screen
space≡5 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {space≔6, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+6}: Moves/Window to middle-right screen
space≡6 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {space≔4, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+4}: Moves/Window to middle-left screen
space≡1 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {space≔2, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+2}: Moves/Window to bottom-center screen
space≡2 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {space≔3, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+3}: Moves/Window to bottom-right screen
space≡3 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {space≔1, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+1}: Moves/Window to bottom-left screen
space≡7 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Down ↦ {space≔4, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+4}: Moves/Window to middle-left screen
space≡8 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Down ↦ {space≔5, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+5}: Moves/Window to middle-center screen
space≡9 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Down ↦ {space≔6, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+6}: Moves/Window to middle-right screen
space≡4 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Down ↦ {space≔1, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+1}: Moves/Window to bottom-left screen
space≡5 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Down ↦ {space≔2, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+2}: Moves/Window to bottom-center screen
space≡6 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Down ↦ {space≔3, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+3}: Moves/Window to bottom-right screen
space≡1 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Down ↦ {space≔7, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+7}: Moves/Window to top-left screen
space≡2 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Down ↦ {space≔8, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+8}: Moves/Window to top-center screen
space≡3 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Down ↦ {space≔9, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9}: Moves/Window to top-right screen
Cmd+PgUp ↦ Ctrl+PgUp: Move to previous tab
Cmd+PgDn ↦ Ctrl+PgDn: Move to next tab
Ctrl+PgUp ↦ Shift+Cmd+`: Move to previous window
Ctrl+PgDn ↦ Cmd+`: Move to next window
Shift?+Cmd+Left ↦ Shift?+Opt+Left: Move/Select to word start
Shift?+Cmd+Right ↦ Shift?+Opt+Right: Move/Select to word end
Cmd+Bksp ↦ Opt+Bksp: Delete to word start
Cmd+Del ↦ Opt+Fn+Bksp: Delete to word end
